title: Free Skins? Its a TRAP!
body:
Seems to be a glitch that appears in game that says the skins cost zero IP

http://tinypic.com/r/14diwrb/8

replies.body: i have that same issue and cant open my friends list

I wish they cost 0 IP!!!

Now they must give them to use for that cause it says so!
that would be amazing if there was free skins
